title: Enhanced Web Payload Classification Using WAMM: An AI-Based Framework for Dataset Refinement and Model Evaluation
dimension: AI Threat Recognition and Incident Response
summary: Web applications increasingly face evasive and polymorphic attack payloads, yet traditional web application firewalls (WAFs) based on static rule sets such as the OWASP Core Rule Set (CRS) often miss obfuscated or zero-day patterns without extensive manual tuning.
